generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Block Redstone Conductivity
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: The basic redstone properties of a block. If the component is not provided the default values are used.

fields.title: Allows Wire To Step Down
fields.description: Specifies if redstone wire can stair-step downward on the block.

fields.title: Redstone Conductor
fields.description: Specifies if the block can be powered by redstone.
